detectCmp.exists: body > div#page > div:nth-child(4)#privacy_collapse > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(3)#privacyOptInOut > button:nth-child(2)#optOut

detectPopup.visible: body > div#page > div:nth-child(4)#privacy_collapse > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(3)#privacyOptInOut > button:nth-child(2)#optOut

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#page > div:nth-child(4)#privacy_collapse > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(3)#privacyOptInOut > button:nth-child(2)#optOut

test.waitForVisible: body > div#page > div:nth-child(4)#privacy_collapse > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(3)#privacyOptInOut > button:nth-child(2)#optOut
